plot: Orphaned during the Korean War, a young woman lives with a man who desires nothing but her happiness. When her former boyfriend shows up, he also promises to make her happy and the woman is forced to choose between the two
title: Sanghan galdaereul geokjimara
plot_es: Orphaned during the Korean War, a young woman lives with a man who desires nothing but her happiness. When her former boyfriend shows up, he also promises to make her happy and the woman is forced to choose between the two
plot_en: Orphaned during the Korean War, a young woman lives with a man who desires nothing but her happiness. When her former boyfriend shows up, he also promises to make her happy and the woman is forced to choose between the two
